snippet: The parents of Kendrec McDade, an unarmed black man shot and killed by Pasadena police officers last month, have filed a lawsuit in federal court against the City of Pasadena.
abstract: Parents of Kendrec McDade, unarmed black man shot and killed by Pasadena, Calif, police officers, file civil-rights and wrongful-death lawsuit against the city, police chief and officers involved.
lead_paragraph: The parents of Kendrec McDade, an unarmed black man shot and killed by Pasadena police officers last month, have filed a lawsuit in federal court against the City of Pasadena.

headline.main: California: City of Pasadena Is Sued in Killing of Unarmed Black Man
headline.print_headline: California: City of Pasadena Is Sued In Killing of Unarmed Black Man
